name: Doggo (itch)
description:
*THIS GAME REQUIRES AND XBOX CONTROLLER*

Doggo is a 3D sandbox came where you play as Doggo at the local dog park. Walk around, play fetch with your owner and talk with other dogs.

This game is a prototype and therefore is not finished.

Created by:

Jake Garrett - Game Designer - jakegarrett.info

Jake Andrews - Game Designer - yabby11.itch.io/

Daniel Jochem - Programmer - danieljochem.wix.com/programmer
